Docs.summary: Returns elapsed milliseconds of the time this process has run.
Docs.value: Returns the number of milliseconds this process has return.

Docs.summary: Defines the start of a range of UIDs (and GIDs), going from this number to #LAST_APPLICATION_UID that are reserved for assigning to applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32[] GetExclusiveCores() cil managed

Docs.summary: On some devices, the foreground process may have one or more CPU cores exclusively reserved for it.
Docs.returns: an array of integers, indicating the CPU cores exclusively reserved for this process. The array will have length zero if no CPU cores are exclusively reserved for this process at this point in time.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 GetGidForName(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the GID assigned to a particular user name, or -1 if there is none.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype Android.OS.ThreadPriority GetThreadPriority(int32 tid) cil managed

Docs.param: The identifier of the thread/process. If tid equals zero, the priority of the calling process/thread will be returned.
Docs.summary: Return the current priority of a thread, based on Linux priorities.
Docs.returns: Returns the current priority, as a Linux priority level, from -20 for highest scheduling priority to 19 for lowest scheduling priority.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws IllegalArgumentException if tid does not exist.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 GetUidForName(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the UID assigned to a particular user name, or -1 if there is none.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsApplicationUid(int32 uid) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns whether the given uid belongs to an application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SetThreadPriority(valuetype Android.OS.ThreadPriority priority) cil managed

Docs.param: A Linux priority level, from -20 for highest scheduling priority to 19 for lowest scheduling priority.
Docs.summary: Set the priority of the calling thread, based on Linux priorities.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws IllegalArgumentException if tid does not exist.
Throws SecurityException if your process does not have permission to modify the given thread, or to use the given priority.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetThreadPriority (int tid, Android.OS.ThreadPriority priority);
.method public static hidebysig void SetThreadPriority(int32 tid, valuetype Android.OS.ThreadPriority priority) cil managed
static member SetThreadPriority : int * Android.OS.ThreadPriority -> unit

Docs.param: The identifier of the thread/process to change.
A Linux priority level, from -20 for highest scheduling priority to 19 for lowest scheduling priority.
Docs.summary: Set the priority of the calling thread, based on Linux priorities.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws IllegalArgumentException if tid does not exist.
Throws SecurityException if your process does not have permission to modify the given thread, or to use the given priority.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool SupportsProcesses() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determine whether the current environment supports multiple processes.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the system can run in multiple processes, else false if everything is running in a single process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
